text:
Hello everyone
Can anyone know that How to filter blogs with multiple tags with AND condition?

Hey devs, I'm trying to create a custom menu. I feel like i'm close but i can't seem to loop the parent items, just the child items. Does anyone know the HUBL code for looping the parent items? Thanks!
are you supporting just a 2 level nav?
In that case may be easier to use recursion
If you need to know the level,  you can add a incrementing var inside renderMenu
throw {% set level = level + 1 %} into renderMenu
Can i just pay you to write this for me?

Hereâ€™s kind of a demo of how you could use the menu function. This generates HTML that is similar to what the menu module outputs, that way you can tweak it from that starting point, as that is already a great place to start.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/TheWebTech-Basic-Menu-using-Menu-Function>

*How can i order Blog Comments from `Newest to the Oldest`* -> right now it showing oldest to newest

```{% blog_comments "blog_comments" %}```

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Blog-Comment-order-from-Newest-to-the-Oldest/idi-p/215391>
